page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A NURSE
page.content: I woke at 7am,and got all my gear together.Had my breakfast and some coffee then set of for work.Had to be there by 8.15am.My name is Nurse Chandler,I am a theatre nurse at the L & D.First I have to get into my theatre clothes,blue trousers,blue jumper,a hat to keep my hair in and a mask to see that the patient does not catch my germs.Today,the first patient had fallen off her motorbike and was seriously injured.She was taken into the operating theatre.We saw that she had broken her leg but had stones under her skin.The anaesthetic put her to sleep while we took out the stones.We all worked as a team the doctors and nurses together,some are student nurses who I am training.It took over 5 hours,and I left work at about 3.30pm.
